Nerangs.ab: barsom abar griftan yasnəmca. tā sar az pāy gōbišn ēsm ud bōy ō ī ātaxš dahišn yasnəmca vaɱəmca hubərətīmca. ...
"He has to take up the barsom. From yasnəmca until the end, he has to recite it standing. He has to give ēsm and bōy to the fire (and recite): yasnəmca vaɱəmca hubərətīmca. ..."
barsom az barsomdān ul darišn ud namāz ō ī ātaxš barišn yasnəmca vaɱəmca hubərətīmca. ...
"He has to raise the barsom from the barsomdān and bring namāz to the fire (and continue with) yasnəmca vaɱəmca hubərətīmca. ..."
barsom az māhrōy abar griftan abar pāy ēstādan yasnəmca vaɱəmca hubərətīmca. ...
"He should take the barsom from the māhrōy (and continue with) yasnəmca vaɱəmca hubərətīmca ..."
barsom abar griftan ud namāz ō ī ātaxš barišn ud bōy ō ī ātaxš dahišn yasnəmca. tā sar az pāy gōwišn yasnəmca vaɱəmca hubərətīmca. ...
"He should take the barsom. He has to bring namāz to the fire and to give to the fire ēsm ud bōy. They have to recite standing the yasnəmca until the end: yasnəmca vaɱəmca hubərətīmca ..."

Ritual.Commentary: In the greater performances, the same ritual action is carried out at VrS86.1 (=Y62.7)
